property.value: Tracker Editor is the Core feature of the Tracker application. The Core feature models Animal Event Histories for Producer and/or Non Producer Premises. Premises model documents are displayed and manipulated with Tracker Editors, Wizards, and various Importing and Exporting utilities.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Tracker Object Constraint Language (OCL) Query, provides query functionality for Tracker Premises Object Model documents. An OCL interpreter and two OCL selector tools provide the user with the ablitity to query Tracker Premises Object Models and either interpret the results or select the objects in the model that match the query results.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
